Docs.summary: Defines the metadata attribute that Web server controls use to indicate support for event validation. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Event validation prevents forged postbacks to an ASP.NET Web page and can be enabled through the `EnableEventValidation` page directive.
For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.EnableEventValidation%2A>. For more information about attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
